Quantitative Researcher/Engineer at Squarepoint Capital

  • › Supervised 3 research engineers in developing an Auto-ML framework which includes exploratory data analysis, model fitting, hyperparameter optimization and model interpretation.
  • › Designed and implemented objective functions for portfolio optimization.
  • › Developed regression model for a long-short equity strategy surpassing previous benchmarks by 4%.

Engineer at Morgan Stanley

  • › Delivered optimal Java server reporting engine to the Bank Deposits Team that manages $140 Billion in firmwide deposits.
